news.title: Gold Bull Market Intact
news.summary: Van Eck's Casanova states early 2026 volatility won't derail gold's bull run; miner cash flow supports reratings.

news.title: Texas Bullion Program
news.summary: Texas unveils official bullion program and gold bills, signaling increased state-level interest in physical gold.

macro.insight: Gold's bull market remains supported by strong miner fundamentals and record cash flows despite early year volatility.

metals.insight: Silver forecasted to average $81/oz in 2026, more than double the 2025 average, as the price floor rises.
Maintains long position on gold but warns that speculative flows could trigger further pullbacks.

crypto.insight: Bitcoin faces strong resistance at $70,000, while Ethereum maintains support near $1,900.

social_intelligence.insight: Silver's recent rally described as a 'seven sigma event'. YOLO traders and speculative flows are driving extreme volatility.
Social discourse is dominated by the $70k resistance level. Sentiment is cautiously optimistic but wary of rejection.
